short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform diverse content into engaging podcasts, expanding your world through effortless listening.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any webpage and various files into podcasts with just one click. Listen anytime, anywhere using popular podcast clients like Apple Podcast, Castro, Overcast, Pocket Casts and more.

Feature Highlights:
✔ Instant podcast generation from any webpage
✔ One-click podcast creation from Gmail
✔ Webpage content translation
✔ Upload and convert various files to podcasts (Word, TXT, Video, Audio, etc.)
✔ Multiple language support, including English, French, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Hindi, Russian, and more.

How to use:
✦ Click the extension icon on any webpage
✦ Select "Generate Podcast" and choose your preferred podcast style
✦ OmniAudio will automatically create your podcast
